title: Perplexity Pages — AI Tool Review
description: Perplexity Pages lets you create comprehensive, beautifully formatted AI-researched articles on any topic — fully cited and shareable. Perplexity Pages is a feature within Perplexity that generates comprehensive, multi-section articles on any topic using AI-driven web research. The resulting pages are fully cited, beautifully formatted, and shareable as public URLs. It's a compelling tool for creating reference content, guides, and research summaries quickly. Highlights: Comprehensive multi-section articles. Real-time web research with citations. Shareable public URLs. Beautiful formatting. Free to use.
